Kid Snacks Market

A Detailed Analysis of the Kid Snacks Market by Salty, Refrigerated, and Frozen Confectionary

FMI unveils the secrets of the kid snacks market.

Request Sample
  • Report Preview

Kid Snacks Market Snapshot (2023 to 2033)

The global kid snacks market garnered a market value of US$ 61870.9 million in 2023 and is expected to accumulate a market value of US$ 131706.7 million by registering a CAGR of 7.8% in the forecast period 2023 to 2033.

The growth of the kid snacks market can be attributed to flavorful snacks, aggressive advertisements, and organic snack products. The market for kid snacks registered a CAGR of 2.7% in the historical period 2018 to 2022

Report Attribute Details

Expected Market Value (2023)

US$ 61870.9 million

Anticipated Forecast Value (2033)

US$ 131706.7 million

Projected Growth Rate (2023 to 2033)

7.8% CAGR

A snack is a portion of food that is generally consumed on casual occasions or in between meals. Snacks are smaller than regular meals and are available in a variety of forms such as processed foods and packed snack food, as well as snacks made from fresh ingredients at home. Kid snacks are a small category that covers the snacks consumed by children.

Processed snack foods that are available in the market are a type of convenience food, that is designed or prepared to be more durable, less perishable, and more portable than food that is prepared at home. Snacks often contain substantial amounts of preservatives, salt, and sweeteners. Beverages, such as cold drinks, juices, or dairy products are not generally considered snacks though they may be consumed in lieu of snack foods.

Don't pay for what you don't need

Customize your report by selecting specific countries or regions and save 30%!

Which are some Prominent Drivers of the Kid Snacks Market?

Parents these days are more concerned about their children’s health and are willing to buy healthy and nutritious snack products. Companies have become more competitive in terms of launching healthy snacks. Moreover, manufacturers also offer toys inside the snack in order to attract the kids.

All these factors are fuelling the growth of the kid snacks market globally. International evidence clearly shows that snack promotion influences the consumption of processed snack foods by kids. Various kid snack manufacturers are aggressively advertising to promote their products, which is higher traction and in turn bolsters the kid snacks demand all over the world.

Through online sales, manufacturers are also providing various offers and coupons to attract more consumers, which could aid the sustainable growth of the kid snacks market in the forecast period.

What Are The Challenges Faced By The Kid Snacks Market?

The poor nutritional content of kid snacks is a derailing factor in the market growth. In certain cases, kids tend to completely rely on snacks instead of food. Thus, most parents are not investing in the kid snacks market.

In addition, the increasing disposable of single-use plastics used for making kid snacks has become a matter of concern for government authorities across the globe. All these factors are hampering the growth of the kid snacks market.

Organic Snacks Contributing To Kid Snacks Market In North America?

North America has also emerged as a prominent market for kid snacks, as the popularity of organic snacks is increasing to a significant level in this region. In addition, the rising prominence of grocery stores and convenience stores is accelerating the growth of the kid snacks market in the region. The increasing penetration of different snack companies is favoring the market growth in North America.

Due to the reasons mentioned above, North America is expected to possess a 27.4% market share for the kid snacks market in 2022.

Increase In Production Capacity Fueling Growth Of Kid Snacks Market In Europe?

In order to generate more sales, European manufacturers are focusing on expanding product portfolio and production capacity, which in turn will drive the market of kid snacks in the forecast period

Manufacturers are targeting both online and offline retailers with the objective to expand their distribution networks, thereby making products easily available to consumers. Owing to the aforementioned reasons, Europe is expected to hold a 24.5% market share for the kid snacks market in 2022

Bakery Products Escalating Sales Of Kid Snacks Market In Asia Pacific?

Among these regions, Asia Pacific is expected to have a major global market share. The bakery segment is the most popular segment in the kid snacks market in the Asia Pacific, as the bakery segment includes delicious cakes, biscuits, and chips.

From dairy-rich to vegan kid snacks, international and local market players largely penetrate the Asia Pacific kid snacks market. All these factors are positively influencing the growth of the kid snacks market. Thus, Asia Pacific is expected to procure a 22% market share for the kid snacks market in 2022.

Start-ups for Kid Snacks Market

Key players in the start-ups for kid snacks market are Else Nutrition, Nutribud Foods, Jetson, Yamo, and Slurrp Farm

  • Slurrp Farm, a key start-up player in the kid snacks market, focuses on innovating nutritional snacks for kids in India and UAE. The company is trying to close the malnutrition gap by providing healthy snacking options.

Market Competition

Some of the key players in the kid snacks market include Procter&Gamble, PepsiCo, Inc., The Kraft Heinz Company, Conagra Brands Inc., Calbee, Inc., General Mills, Inc., Intersnack, Lorenz Snack-World, and Mondelez International, Inc. among others.,

  • In May 2022, Conagra Brands Inc. exhibited a snacks and sweets lineup at the Sweets & Snacks Expo. The company focuses on offering sweet treats, meat, and salty snacks.
  • Perfect Snacks has partnered with Mondelez International to increase its production of nutritional bars. The companies together are focusing on offering innovative snacks.
  • Calbee evaluated a very small quantity of a novel veggie 'cube' snack designed by an elementary school student in January 2021 for the Japanese snack giant's annual contest to weed out standout concepts.
  • Snack Pack, a Conagra Brands, Inc. brand, collaborated with SOUR PATCH KIDS® to launch a set of sour and sweet Juicy Gels in February 2021.

FMI projects the global kid snacks market to expand at a 7.8% value CAGR by 2033.

Which region is forecast to be the most lucrative for the kid snacks market growth?

FMI projects the global kid snacks market to expand at a 7.8% value by CAGR by 2033.

Which are some prominent kid snacks manufacturers?
